page.title: 05Housing Around Newburgh
page.content: In the past ten years the population in Newburgh and surrounding area has grown.In Newburgh two new housing estates have been built.The largest has been built by three companies to the North of the village.The other estate was built by Macrae Homes.It has been built in an area of land beside some council houses south of School Road.In Newburgh and Tipperty the main types of houses are semi- detached and detached.There are also a lot of farm cottages. In Newburgh some street names are Airyhill View,Mathers Place,Mavis Bank,Inch Road,Millend,Tern Avenue,Haddo Crescent,Eider Road and Red Inch Circle. There are also a few large older type houses such as Ythan Lodge,Newburgh House and Rose Cottage.Some of these date back almost two centuries.
